00057 void BtnObjectCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00058 {

00063       else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
00064       {
00065             SetEditorTerrainTaskbarMode( TERRAIN_PLACE_TREES );
00066             iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_OSTRUCTS;
00067       }
00068 }

00349 void BuildingNewRoomCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00350 {
00351       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00352       {
00353             SetEditorBuildingTaskbarMode( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM );
00354             gusSelectionType = gusSavedBuildingSelectionType;
00355             iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROOM;
00356       }
00357       else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
00358       {
00359             SetEditorBuildingTaskbarMode( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM );
00360             gusSelectionType = gusSavedBuildingSelectionType;
00361             iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROOM;
00362             iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_GET_ROOM;
00363       }
00364 }

00448 void BuildingToggleRoofViewCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00449 {
00450       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00451       {
00452             if( fBuildingShowRoofs ^= 1 )
00453             {
00454                   ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
00455             }
00456             else
00457             {
00458                   UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
00459             }
00460             //Name could be a bit misleading.  It'll hide or show the roofs based on the
00461             //fBuildingShowRoofs value.
00462             UpdateRoofsView();
00463       }
00464 }
00465 
00466 void BuildingToggleWallViewCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00467 {
00468       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00469       {
00470             if( fBuildingShowWalls ^= 1 )
00471             {
00472                   ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
00473             }
00474             else
00475             {
00476                   UnclickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
00477             }
00478             //Name could be a bit misleading.  It'll hide or show the walls based on the
00479             //fBuildingShowWalls value.
00480             UpdateWallsView();
00481       }
00482 }

00484 void BuildingToggleInfoViewCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)

00500 //MAPINFO
00501 void BtnFakeLightCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00502 {
00503       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00504       {
00505             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00506                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00507             else
00508                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00509       
00510             iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_FAKE_LIGHTING;
00511       }
00512 }
00513

00518 }
00519 
00520 void MapInfoDrawExitGridCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00521 {
00522       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00523             SetEditorMapInfoTaskbarMode( MAPINFO_DRAW_EXITGRIDS );
00524       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00525       {
00526             SetEditorMapInfoTaskbarMode( MAPINFO_DRAW_EXITGRIDS );
00527             LocateNextExitGrid();
00528       }
00529 }
00530 
00531 void MapInfoEntryPointsCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00532 {
00533       if( reason & (MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP | MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP) )
00534       {
00535             INT16 x, sGridNo;
00536             for( x = MAPINFO_NORTH_POINT; x <= MAPINFO_ISOLATED_POINT; x++ )
00537             {
00538                   if( btn == ButtonList[ iEditorButton[ x ] ] )
00539                   {
00540                         SetEditorMapInfoTaskbarMode( x );
00541                         if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00542                         {
00543                               switch( x )
00544                               {
00545                                     case MAPINFO_NORTH_POINT:                 sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;               break;
00546                                     case MAPINFO_WEST_POINT:                  sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;                break;
00547                                     case MAPINFO_EAST_POINT:                  sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;                break;
00548                                     case MAPINFO_SOUTH_POINT:                 sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;               break;
00549                                     case MAPINFO_CENTER_POINT:          sGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;        break;
00550                                     case MAPINFO_ISOLATED_POINT:  sGridNo = gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo;      break;
00551                               }
00552                               if( sGridNo != -1 )
00553                               {
00554                                     CenterScreenAtMapIndex( sGridNo );
00555                               }
00556                         }
00557                         break;
00558                   }
00559             }
00560       }
00561 }
00562

00610 void BtnNewBasementCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00611 {
00612       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00613       {
00614             iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_NEW_MAP;
00615             gfPendingBasement = TRUE;
00616             gfPendingCaves = FALSE;
00617       }
00618 }
00619

00623       {
00624             iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_NEW_MAP;
00625             gfPendingBasement = FALSE;
00626             gfPendingCaves = TRUE;
00627       }
00628 }

00678 {
00679       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00680             HandleItemsPanel( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos, GUI_LCLICK_EVENT );
00681       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00682             HandleItemsPanel( gusMouseXPos, gusMouseYPos, GUI_RCLICK_EVENT );
00683 }

00738 
00739 void ItemsLeftScrollCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason)
00740 {
00741       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00742       {
00743             gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00744             eInfo.sScrollIndex--;
00745             if( !eInfo.sScrollIndex )
00746                   DisableButton( iEditorButton[ITEMS_LEFTSCROLL] );
00747             if( eInfo.sScrollIndex < ((eInfo.sNumItems+1)/2)-6 )
00748                   EnableButton( iEditorButton[ITEMS_RIGHTSCROLL] );
00749       }
00750 }
00751 
00752 void ItemsRightScrollCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason)
00753 {
00754       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00755       {
00756             gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00757             eInfo.sScrollIndex++;
00758             EnableButton( iEditorButton[ITEMS_LEFTSCROLL] );
00759             if( eInfo.sScrollIndex == max( ((eInfo.sNumItems+1)/2)-6, 0) )
00760                   DisableButton( iEditorButton[ITEMS_RIGHTSCROLL] );
00761       }
00762 }

00810 void MercsPlayerTeamCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00811 {
00812       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00813       {
00814             ClickEditorButton( MERCS_PLAYER );
00815             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_ENEMY );
00816             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_CREATURE );
00817             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_REBEL );
00818             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_CIVILIAN );
00819             iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_PLAYER;
00820             SetMercEditingMode ( MERC_TEAMMODE );
00821       }
00822 }
00823 
00824 void MercsEnemyTeamCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00825 {
00826       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00827       {
00828             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_PLAYER );
00829             ClickEditorButton( MERCS_ENEMY );
00830             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_CREATURE );
00831             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_REBEL );
00832             UnclickEditorButton( MERCS_CIVILIAN );
00833             iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ENEMY;
00834             SetMercEditingMode ( MERC_TEAMMODE );
00835       }
00836       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00837       {
00838             IndicateSelectedMerc( SELECT_NEXT_ENEMY );
00839       }
00840 }

00923       }

01035       {
01036             FindScheduleGridNo( 0 );
01037       }

01046             RegisterCurrentScheduleAction( gCurrSchedule.usData1[0] );
01047       }
01048       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
01049       {
01050             FindScheduleGridNo( 1 );
01051       }
01052 }

01147 
01148 void MercsDetailedPlacementCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01149 {
01150       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01151       {
01152             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ) //button is checked
01153             {
01154                   InitDetailedPlacementForMerc();
01155                   SetMercEditingMode( MERC_GENERALMODE );
01156             }
01157             else //button is unchecked.
01158             {
01159                   KillDetailedPlacementForMerc();
01160                   SetMercEditingMode( MERC_BASICMODE );
01161             }
01162       }
01163 }
01164 
01165 void MercsPriorityExistanceCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01166 {
01167       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01168       {
01169             if( gpSelected )
01170             {
01171                   if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ) //button is checked
01172                   {
01173                         gpSelected->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance = TRUE;
01174                   }
01175                   else //button is unchecked.
01176                   {
01177                         gpSelected->pBasicPlacement->fPriorityExistance = FALSE;
01178                   }
01179             }
01180       }
01181 }
01182 
01183 void MercsHasKeysCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01184 {
01185       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01186       {
01187             if( gpSelected )
01188             {
01189                   if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ) //button is checked
01190                   {
01191                         gpSelected->pBasicPlacement->fHasKeys = TRUE;
01192                   }
01193                   else //button is unchecked.
01194                   {
01195                         gpSelected->pBasicPlacement->fHasKeys = FALSE;
01196                   }
01197                   if( gpSelected->pDetailedPlacement )
01198                   {
01199                         gpSelected->pDetailedPlacement->fHasKeys = gpSelected->pBasicPlacement->fHasKeys;
01200                   }
01201             }
01202       }
01203 }
01204

01262 
01263 void MercsFindSelectedMercCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01264 {
01265       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01266       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01267       {
01268             if( gsSelectedMercID == -1 )
01269                   return;
01270             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gsSelectedMercID );
01271             if( !pSoldier )
01272                   return;
01273             CenterScreenAtMapIndex( pSoldier->sGridNo );
01274       }
01275 }

01280             SetMercRelativeEquipment( (INT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 ) );

01289 void MouseMovedInMercRegion( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01290 {
01291       HandleMercInventoryPanel( reg->RelativeXPos, reg->RelativeYPos, GUI_MOVE_EVENT );
01292 }
01293 
01294 void MouseClickedInMercRegion( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01295 {
01296       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01297             HandleMercInventoryPanel( reg->RelativeXPos, reg->RelativeYPos, GUI_LCLICK_EVENT );             
01298       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
01299             HandleMercInventoryPanel( reg->RelativeXPos, reg->RelativeYPos, GUI_RCLICK_EVENT );
01300 }

01302 //VARIOUS
01303 void BtnUndoCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01304 {
01305       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01306       {
01307             iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_UNDO;
01308       }
01309 }
01310 
01311 void BtnEraseCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01312 {
01313       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01314       {
01315             if( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
01316                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01317             else
01318                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01319             iEditorToolbarState = (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON) ? (TBAR_MODE_ERASE) : (TBAR_MODE_ERASE_OFF);
01320       }
01321 }
01322 
01323 //ITEM STATS
01324 void ItemStatsToggleHideCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01325 {
01326       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01327       {
01328             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
01329                   ExecuteItemStatsCmd( ITEMSTATS_HIDE );
01330             else
01331                   ExecuteItemStatsCmd( ITEMSTATS_SHOW );
01332       }
01333 }
01334 
01335 void ItemStatsDeleteCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01336 {
01337       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01338             ExecuteItemStatsCmd( ITEMSTATS_DELETE );
01339 }
